game.name: Wings Of War
game.description:
Aspiring to be a fighter pilot, this war game exhibit is one of the most prolific one to test your fighter plane skills in a near simulation game play and plot of wings of war adventure game online. A perfect flight combat game, it is the free adventure game online where about 20, 000 feet above the ground, you shoot down the enemy planes. All the advance weaponry is offered to you with this version of online game including machine guns and bombers.

Being as one of the most advanced amazing online game with the features of air combat skills as aerodynamics, durability, and turning ability of your plane can be upgraded as much enemy planes you crush.

Other additional upgrades with the game offered include reload, damage, and radar in the one of the best adventure games online. When targeting the enemy planes, efforts, should be towards hitting them straight. At the same time, do also protect your plane as well from the tirades of enemy bullets as well too. As far as game progresses, the numbers of enemy planes do also increases simultaneously.

The?online?Wings Of War game for all the age groups has very simple controls for flying as well as fighting in the sky. Use the mouse or the arrow keys to move your plane and fly it in different directions. Use the up arrow key to move forward and the left and right arrow keys to turn your plane in both directions. Use the ?X ?key to shoot at your target, use the key ?C ?to move in loops. Press turn and use key ?B ?to activate the turbo booster.
